news.title: CRADLE OF FILTH Fires ASHOK After His Comments About Leaving The Band After Their Current Tour
news.summary:
"Despite all attempts to illegally defame and derail the band, Cradle Of Filth WILL NOT cancel any of our South American shows." 
 The post  CRADLE OF FILTH Fires ASHOK After His Comments About Leaving The Band After Their Current Tour  appeared first on  Metal Injection .
